label: Atlanta Braves

metadata.label: Description
metadata.value: View of members of the Atlanta Braves baseball team and their families before a game at Atlanta Stadium (later named Atlanta-Fulton County Stadium).

metadata.label: Notes
metadata.value: The Atlanta Braves are a Major League Baseball team based out of Atlanta, Georgia.  The Braves began play in Atlanta in 1966.

metadata.label: Publisher
metadata.value: Kenan Research Center, Atlanta History Center, 130 West Paces Ferry Road, Atlanta, GA 30305
